summary: ClosingSection was updated and no longer contains any footer/copyright year text, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that all other occurrences of “© 2026” / “© {currentYear}” across the rest of the UI were removed. Additionally, meta/project tracking files were modified in ways not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the visible copyright text "© 2026" (and any dynamic equivalent like "© {currentYear}") from the app UI (not just the Closing section footer).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to ClosingSection.tsx; there’s no evidence in the provided diff summary that other components/screens were checked/updated to ensure no “©” + year text appears anywhere else in the UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (no evidence of edits to other UI components)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project tracking entries (AR-1/AR-2) and modified project state metadata unrelated to the UI text removal requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove copyright text from the UI; it does not request changes to project_state.json feature request tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/updated a frontend file summaries document.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request generating or editing documentation/summaries; this change is not required to remove UI text.
